slideText.german:
Hmm, wer bist Du denn? Und was willst Du hier so früh?
...
Wir haben jetzt einen Termin sagst Du? Das kann nicht sein...
slideText.english:
Hmm, who are you? And what are you doing here so early?
...
We have an appointment now, you say? It can't be...
slideText.portuguese:
O meu nome é Gato Corrector e estou feliz por se juntar a mim na minha aventura.
Vamo-nos afundar no mundo das histórias. Iremos ler e ouvir diferentes histórias.
Mas o leitor comete muitos erros.
br>Ajude-me a corrigi-lo, para que também possa tornar-se um leitor perfeito.
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) My name is Corrector Cat and I am happy that you’re joining me on my adventure.
Let’s sink in into the world of stories. We will read and listen to different stories.
But the reader makes many mistakes.

Help me to correct him, so he can become a purrrfect reader as well.

slideText.german:
AHHH, DER TERMIN!

DAS HABE ICH JA GANZ VERGESSEN!
slideText.english:
AHHH, THE APPOINTMENT!

I TOTALLY FORGOT!
slideText.portuguese:
Precisamos de lhe mostrar que tipo de erro cometeu.
Outra forma, ele não pode melhorar as suas capacidades de leitura.
Por conseguinte, vou mostrar-lhe os erros que são cometidos durante a leitura
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistake he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

slideText.german:
Du bist also der neue Laufbursche...äh...hochgeschätzte Praktikant meine ich natürlich!

Ich bin Corrector Cat und leite dieses Aufnahmestudio.
Erfreut, Dich kennenzulernen!
slideText.english:
So you are the new errand boy... er...highly appreciated intern I mean, of course!

I am Corrector Cat and run this recording studio.
Pleased to meet you!
slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistakes he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

slideText.german:
Also... Auf Empfehlung Deines Lehrers habe ich Dich ausnahmsweise als Praktikanten akzeptiert.
Sowas mache ich eigentlich nie.

Du darfst Dich jetzt bedanken!

Aber nun zu Deinen Aufgaben hier...
slideText.english:
So... On the recommendation of your teacher I accepted you as a intern.
I don't accept interns normally.

You may thank me now!

But now to your tasks here...
slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistakes he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

slideText.german:
Die Sache ist die: Ein Computervirus hat alle meine Tonaufnahmen gelöscht.
Daraufhin habe ich einige neue Sprecher angestellt.

Die sind aber alle noch sehr unerfahren...
slideText.english:
Here's the thing: A computer virus has deleted all my sound recordings.
So I have hired some new speakers.

But they are all still very inexperienced...
slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistakes he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistakes he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

slideText.german:
Du kannst Dir sicher vorstellen, dass solche Aufnahmen nicht zu gebrauchen sind.
Die Sprecher müssen lernen, wie man richtig liest.

Und da kommst Du ins Spiel.
slideText.english:
You can probably imagine that such recordings are useless.
The speakers have to learn how to read properly.

And this is where you come in.
slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistakes he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

slideText.german:
Ich habe leider nicht die Zeit, alle Sprecher zu trainieren.
Deshalb zeige ich Dir, was gutes Vorlesen ausmacht.

Dann kannst Du es den Sprechern beibringen!

Fangen wir direkt an!
slideText.english:
Unfortunately I don't have the time to train all the speakers.
That's why I'll show you how good reading aloud sounds like.

Then you can teach it to the speakers!

Let's start right away!
slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistakes he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

slideText.german:
Hören wir uns zunächst noch ein paar Beispiele an.

Vergleiche das Gehörte mit dem Text (Skript) und sag mir, was der Leser falsch gemacht hat.
slideText.english:
Let's first listen to some examples.

Compare what you heard with the text (script) and tell me what the reader did wrong.
slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!
slideText.greek:
(GREEK) We need to show him what kind of mistakes he has made.
Otherwise he can’t improve his reading skills.
Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.

quiz.text: Die Tiefen des unerforschten Meeres scheinen immens. Wann wird wohl das nächste Tier entdeckt, das einen neuen Größenrekord aufstellt?

slideText.german:
Super, damit hätten wir die Grundlagen geklärt.

Legen wir direkt mit einem richtigen Text los!
slideText.english:
Great, with that we have covered the basics.

Let's start right away with a real text!
slideText.portuguese:
Ficou agora a conhecer os tipos de erro.
Pode sempre voltar aqui se tiver dúvidas sobre eles.
Vemo-nos no jogo!

Therefore, I am going to show you errors which are made while reading.
